price: Lakini nyoyo zao zimeghafilika na hayo, na wanavyo vitendo vinginevyo wanavyo vifanya.
arabic: بَلۡ قُلُوبُهُمۡ فِي غَمۡرَةٖ مِّنۡ هَٰذَا وَلَهُمۡ أَعۡمَٰلٞ مِّن دُونِ ذَٰلِكَ هُمۡ لَهَا عَٰمِلُونَ
footnotes: Lakini makafiri kwa sababu ya inadi yao na chuki zao ni wenye kughafilika na kufanya kheri, na kujikalifu kufanya liwezekanalo, na kwamba kuna hisabu ya kuchungua kila kitu. Na mbali na hayo bado wanavyo vitendo vingine viovu wanavyo dumu navyo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: bal qulūbuhum fī ghamratin min hādhā walahum aʿmālun min dūni dhālika hum lahā ʿāmilūna
